tool_description: Creates visual timeline representations of ownership history with interactive elements and customizable display options.

item_id.description: Unique identifier for the collection item

timeline_style.description: Visual style for timeline (horizontal, vertical, circular)

color_scheme.description: Color scheme for visualization (classic, modern, accessible)

error_messages: Item not found: The specified item_id does not exist in the system.
Invalid timeline_style: Must be one of [horizontal, vertical, circular].
Invalid color_scheme: Must be one of [classic, modern, accessible].
No ownership data: No ownership chain available for visualization.
usage: Provide item_id to create timeline visualization. Configure style, gap highlighting, and color scheme for optimal display.

visualization_id.description: Unique identifier for the timeline visualization

interactive_elements.description: Number of interactive elements in the timeline
